name: The Vibrational Marketing
offering: Allison (Wentworth) Rossng, Book Writing Coach, Business Consulting, Intuition Coaching, Online Course Creation, Online Education for Business Owners
what_you_do: The Vibrational Marketing Institute focuses on transforming beliefs around business and marketing through principles like the Law of Vibration, Law of Attraction, and Law of Reciprocity, aiming to create a healed planet where everyone thrives.
who_you_serve: They serve individuals and entrepreneurs interested in personal growth, self-awareness, and creating abundance in their lives and businesses.
signature_programs: One-Year Vibrational Marketing Foundation Program, 12-Week Quantum Collaboration Program
business_focus: The Vibrational Marketing Institute focuses on transforming beliefs around business and marketing through principles like the Law of Vibration, Law of Attraction, and Law of Reciprocity, aiming to create a healed planet where everyone thrives.
